channel.title: RSWorld
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/axEZl.png[/img] [size=14pt]- 474, 508 and 699 Quality.[/size] Based on 474 era. We are aiming for unique features and details. Follow and support, daily updates are being made! Testing phase: [I][B][size=14pt]Unavailable[/size][/B][/I] [QUOTE]Testing phase. Commands you are be able to use are ::item ::setlevel :.players ::switch ::yell / (clan chat) Gameframe changing ::474 ::508 ::699 [URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/6815113/RSWorld3.jar"]RSWorld3 Client Download[/URL] (updated 6/2/2012) We're in need of players to test our Castle Wars, everyone come. See you there. [/QUOTE] [SIZE=14pt]Pets[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LEE6n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/72TTi.png[/img] [size=14pt]Switching[/SIZE] Link - http://eliminatepk.com/images/Infexis%20Switching.gif [size=14pt]Castle Wars[/SIZE] - All correct interfaces - Correct timers in minutes - More... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tgQMR.png[/img] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zfjpU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JXFKT.png[/img][/CENTER] [size=14pt]Gameframe Changer[/SIZE] - All three gameframes perfected - Correct drawMenu for each gameframe - Perfect toggling from one gameframe to another [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uZbBg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vwhbG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/msDVj.png[/img][/CENTER] [size=14pt]Clan Chat[/SIZE] - Talking - Kicking - Promoting - Ranks(yellow = clan owner, green = clan mod) - Saving [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e2N7k.png[/img], [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T2lH8.png[/img][/CENTER] [size=14pt]Report Abuse[/SIZE] - You cannot report yourself - You can only report if the players has talked - You can report every 60 seconds - Well organized report log - Date(year, month, day, hour, minute, second) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JP8EC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7x8Wv.png[/img] [size=14pt]Update Log[/SIZE]
- Started on pets - More Castle Wars bugs fixed - Added hoykeys - Added a flawless item switching/clicking(thanks to Eliminate) - Clipped following added - Fixed bugs - Testing phase held for 1 hour - Fixed Castle Wars bugs & objects - Waiting room, interfaces, timer added/working - Castle Wars started - 474, 508, 696 gameframe finished - 508 gameframe added, started fixing up 474 gameframe - Started gameframe changer between 474 and 508 - Fixed clan chat saving - Fixed clan chat bugs & added ranks + commands - Started on Clan Chat - Fixed "teleport in combat" bug - Crystal Chest added(not tested) - Improved player updating - Added 'Only Donator' items(phats & santa(may include skillcapes)) - Organized Logger.java & running - Fixed Mage & Range attack from distance - Finished Premium Members system - Started Premium Member system - Added vengeance & teleport other - Fixed player saving - Fixed & organized Report Abuse System - Report Abuse System added - Dwarf Mutli Cannon - Capitalized Names
The thread is still under progression. Don't make it stop you from replying! All unnecessary replies will be reported!

Keep up the replies. More updates coming each day.

item.title: RSWorld
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:


[size=14pt]- 474, 508 and 699 Quality.[/size]
Based on 474 era. We are aiming for unique features and details. Follow and support, daily updates are being made!

Testing phase: [size=14pt]Unavailable[/size]

[QUOTE]Testing phase.

Commands you are be able to use are
::item
::setlevel
:.players
::switch
::yell
/ (clan chat)

Gameframe changing
::474
::508
::699

RSWorld3 Client Download (updated 6/2/2012)

We’re in need of players to test our Castle Wars, everyone come. See you there.
[/QUOTE]
[SIZE=14pt]Pets[/SIZE]

[size=14pt]Switching[/SIZE]

Link - http://eliminatepk.com/images/Infexis%20Switching.gif

[size=14pt]Castle Wars[/SIZE]

  • All correct interfaces
  • Correct timers in minutes
  • More…

[CENTER]

[/CENTER]

[size=14pt]Gameframe Changer[/SIZE]

  • All three gameframes perfected
  • Correct drawMenu for each gameframe
  • Perfect toggling from one gameframe to another

[CENTER]

uZbBg.png887×645

vwhbG.png887×645

msDVj.png887×645
[/CENTER]

[size=14pt]Clan Chat[/SIZE]

  • Talking
  • Kicking
  • Promoting
  • Ranks(yellow = clan owner, green = clan mod)
  • Saving

[CENTER],

T2lH8.png713×267
[/CENTER]

[size=14pt]Report Abuse[/SIZE]

  • You cannot report yourself
  • You can only report if the players has talked
  • You can report every 60 seconds
  • Well organized report log
  • Date(year, month, day, hour, minute, second)

[size=14pt]Update Log[/SIZE]

- Started on pets - More Castle Wars bugs fixed - Added hoykeys - Added a flawless item switching/clicking(thanks to Eliminate) - Clipped following added - Fixed bugs - Testing phase held for 1 hour - Fixed Castle Wars bugs & objects - Waiting room, interfaces, timer added/working - Castle Wars started - 474, 508, 696 gameframe finished - 508 gameframe added, started fixing up 474 gameframe - Started gameframe changer between 474 and 508 - Fixed clan chat saving - Fixed clan chat bugs & added ranks + commands - Started on Clan Chat - Fixed "teleport in combat" bug - Crystal Chest added(not tested) - Improved player updating - Added 'Only Donator' items(phats & santa(may include skillcapes)) - Organized Logger.java & running - Fixed Mage & Range attack from distance - Finished Premium Members system - Started Premium Member system - Added vengeance & teleport other - Fixed player saving - Fixed & organized Report Abuse System - Report Abuse System added - Dwarf Mutli Cannon - Capitalized Names

The thread is still under progression. Don’t make it stop you from replying!

All unnecessary replies will be reported!
